hero.title: Professional Emails Made Simple
hero.subtitle: Generate polished, professional emails in seconds. Choose from our templates for time-off requests, HR communications, meetings, and more.

about.title: About OpenMailGen
about.description: OpenMailGen is a free, open-source email template generator designed to help professionals reduce time spent writing emails. Whether it is requesting time off, scheduling a meeting, or communicating with HR, we are trying to have must cases covered. :)

templates.title: Ready-to-Use Templates
templates.description: Choose from a variety of professionally written email templates for common workplace scenarios.

personalization.title: Easy Personalization
personalization.description: Fill in your details once and let the templates do the rest. Your information is saved locally for quick access.

bilingual.title: Bilingual Support
bilingual.description: Full support for English and Arabic, including right-to-left layouts for Arabic users.

free.question: Is OpenMailGen free to use?
free.answer: Yes! OpenMailGen is completely free and open-source. You can use it without any registration or payment.

data.question: Is my data safe?
data.answer: Absolutely. All your profile information is stored locally in your browser. We never send your data to any server.

templates.question: What types of templates are available?
templates.answer: We offer templates for time-off requests, HR communications, meeting scheduling, and general workplace emails. More templates are added regularly.

contribute.question: Can I suggest new templates?
contribute.answer: Yes! OpenMailGen is open-source. You can contribute new templates or suggest ideas through our GitHub repository.
